en.title: Dai Pengjun's catheter in the middle of the night attracted attention
en.content: Recently, Dai Pengjun, a student of our school, watched the yellow video catheter in the middle of the night, which attracted widespread attention. It is reported that in order not to affect the rest of his roommate, the classmate deliberately lowered the volume of the video, but he was still discovered by his attentive roommate. The incident sparked a discussion on campus about the rational arrangement of study and rest time.

en.title: Website building！
en.content: The official website of 321 Dormitory was established and deployed on Github pages

zh.title: 代鹏军同学半夜导管，引发关注
zh.content: 近日，我校代鹏军同学在半夜时分观看黄色视频导管的行为引起了广泛关注。据悉，代同学为了不影响室友休息，特意降低了视频音量，但仍然被细心的室友发现。此事件在校园内引发了关于合理安排学习和休息时间的讨论。

zh.title: 网站建立！
zh.content: 321宿舍官网建立，部署在了Github pages
